snippet: Derek Shrout, 17, is accused of planning to set off dozens of grenades and bombs at his school in Seale, Ala., which police said might have been inspired by the massacre in Newtown, Conn.
abstract: Alabama teenager Derek Shrout is accused of plotting to set off dozens of homemade bombs and grenades at his school in Seale, Ala, in attack that police say might have been inspired by shooting massacre in Newtown, Conn.
lead_paragraph: Derek Shrout, 17, is accused of planning to set off dozens of grenades and bombs at his school in Seale, Ala., which police said might have been inspired by the massacre in Newtown, Conn.

headline.seo: Alabama Teenager Charged in Plot to Stage Mass Attack
headline.main: Youth Charged With Plotting School Attack
headline.print_headline: Youth Charged With Plotting School Attack
